mainOpportunity.alt: Greenwood Green turf field with students playing soccer
mainOpportunity.title:
The Greenwood Green
(Turf Field)
mainOpportunity.description: A premier multi-use turf field at the heart of the Greenspace supporting athletics, outdoor education, and year-round play while serving as a vibrant gathering place for the entire Greenwood community.

gridOpportunities.alt: Greenwood sign and bench in landscaped area
gridOpportunities.title: Greenwood Sign & Bench
gridOpportunities.description: A signature arrival point featuring a custom Greenwood sign and an integrated polished-concrete bench, creating a welcoming landmark for students, families, and visitors.

gridOpportunities.title: The Greenwood Gate
gridOpportunities.description: A prominent gateway marking the entrance to the Greenspace symbolizing openness, community, and the start of every student's outdoor experience.

gridOpportunities.alt: Turf field at night with flood lighting
gridOpportunities.title: Flood Lighting
gridOpportunities.description: Architectural flood lighting that illuminates the Greenspace in the evening, enhancing safety while showcasing Greenwood's outdoor environment.
